    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2205</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection and Refraction of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion und Brechung des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion et réfraction de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão e refraction da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione e rifrazione di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση και διάθλαση του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión y refracción de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates reflection and refraction of light waves at an interface beteen air and glass</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die zeigt, Reflexion und Brechung
der hellen Wellen an einer Schnittstelle beteen Luft und Glas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre réflexion et 
réfraction des vagues légères à une interface beteen l'air et le 
verre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre reflexão e refraction
de ondas claras em uma relação beteen o ar e o vidro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra riflessione e la 
rifrazione delle onde chiare ad un'interfaccia beteen l'aria ed il 
vetro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει αντανάκλαση και 
διάθλαση των φωτεινών κυμάτων σε μια διαπροσωπεία ο αέρας και το 
γυαλί</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra reflexión y 
refracción de ondas ligeras en un interfaz beteen el aire y el 
cristal</string>
          </description>
